# Background Image

| Class                     | Support     |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
bg-none
```           | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-gradient-to-t
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-gradient-to-tr
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-gradient-to-r
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-gradient-to-br
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-gradient-to-b
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-gradient-to-bl
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-gradient-to-l
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
bg-gradient-to-tl
``` | 🌐 Web only |
